loans.name: Felisa

texts.en:
Felisa is married with 6 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Felisa is 44-years-old and has 4 children who are in school.

Felisa has a fruits and vegetables vending business in the Philippines. Felisa requested a PHP 15000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall.

Felisa has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Felisa would like to save money to have another business.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Estrella Karina

texts.es: Estrella de 21 años vive (libertad ecuador). Ella le dieron oportunidad de trabajar en lo que mas le gustara y ella escogió la artesanía . con esfuerzo logro acogerse de ese trabajo para ai poder sustentarse . ella trabaja de jueves a domingo apartie de las 08:00 has la noche l. la dificultad que tiene es la enfermedad de su hija .haci que con ganas realisa su trabajo. a futuro ella quiere darle una vida estable a sus hijas . con el préstamo comprara (materia prima)cemento,arena, bloques para poder mejorar su casa y asi darle una oportunidad de construir su local.
texts.en: Estrella, 21, lives in Libertad, Ecuador.  She was given the opportunity to work in what she likes best and she chose crafts.  With effort she managed to embrace this work to support herself.  She works Thursday to Sunday from 8am until nighttime.  Her difficulty is her daughter’s illness so she works very hard.  In futures she’d like to provide a stable life for her daughters.  She will use the loan to buy raw materials (cement, sand and cinder blocks) to improve her house and have the opportunity to build her locale.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and cinder blocks.

loans.name: Oykhol

texts.ru: Ойхол замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Она очень добрая женщина, которая занимается торговлей на центральном рынке. Более 15 лет Ойхол занимается купле- продажей сладостей, имеет широкий ассортимент продуктов, такие как изюм, печенье, сахар, шоколад, карамель, арахис и другие виды сладостей и сухофруктов. Ойхол надеется на вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Oykhol is married and the loving mother of four children. She is a very kind woman who sells at the central market. Oykhol has been selling sweets for the past 15 years, and has a wide assortment of products such as raisins, cookies, sugar, chocolate, caramels, peanuts, and other types of sweets and dried fruits. She hopes for your help and generosity.

loans.use: To buy sweets

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras”  ubicado en el distrito Juliaca, provincia San Román  y departamento de Puno, tiene 40 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con tres hijos en estudio, la señora estudio educación secundaria.

Trabaja hace tres ciclos con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos,  su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invirtió en la compra de lanas para sus tejidos de chompas, chullos para bebes, también trabaja en llamadas telefónicas.

La señorita solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de  S/. 1000.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que invertirá en la compra de cinco kilos de lanas de diferentes colores, para su confección de prendas, también la señora se dedica a la venta de ovejas, vacas y alpacas, trabaja sola en el negocio su esposo trabaja en la mina.
	
Su sueño para el futuro  es que sus hijos sean profesionales.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo, el ahorro y sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Daniela is a member of the “Las Mensajeras” communal bank located in Juliaca District, San Román Province and Puno Department.  She’s 49 years old, has a spouse and three children attending school.  She went to secondary school.

She’s been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for three cycles.  Her first loan was for 500 new soles that she used to buy wool yarn to knit sweaters and woolen baby caps; she also works in telephone calls.

She is asking for a new loan in the amount of 1000 new soles that she will use to buy five kilos of wool yarn in assorted colors to make clothes.  She also sells sheep, cows and alpacas.  She works alone in her business; her husband works in the mine.

Her dream for the future is that her children become professionals.  What she likes most about her communal bank is the ease of loans, the savings and her earnings.

loans.use: to buy five kilos of wool yarn in assorted colors.

loans.name: Raimkul

texts.ru: Раимкул добрый и честный человек, который более 20 лет занимается земледелием. Он женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей.  Он очень добрый человек, и всегда старается содержать свою семью в хороших условиях жизни. Раимкул хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений для обработки земли и семян для посева. Он надеется на вашу помощь и щедрость.
texts.en: Raimkul is a good and honest person who has been a farmer for over 20 years. He is married and is raising five children. He is a very good person, and is always trying to provide his family with a good quality of life. Raimkul would like a loan to buy mineral fertilizers for working the land and seeds for planting. He hopes for your help and generosity.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Mame Djeynaba

texts.fr: Madame Mame Dieynaba est  une femme mariée de 42 ans qui vit au Sénégal. Elle est salariée et agent dans un service hospitalier de la place.  Elle a  une expérience de 15 ans dans  cette  activité qu’elle a choisie par opportunité après ses études. Elle est très intéressée par les services qu’elle rend en s’occupant des gens qui sont en difficulté. Elle est membre d’un guichet de l’U-IMCEC depuis septembre  2000. Elle a déjà remboursé 10 crédits antérieurs. Elle sollicite un prêt de 300 000 frs prévu pour des travaux de réfection  et de réaménagement  de l’espace familial. La majorité des prêts  qu’elle a consenti  au sein de l’institution lui a permis de faire face aux travaux de construction de sa maison et d’  acquérir des meubles et ou  de subvenir  a des besoins ponctuels.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mame Dieynaba is a 42-year-old married woman who lives in Senegal. She is a salaried clerk in a local healthcare facility, an opportunity that presented itself at the end of her studies. She now has 15 years of experience in this activity and cares deeply about providing services to people in need of assistance. 

A U-IMCEC member since September 2000, she has already received and repaid ten loans. She is now seeking a loan of 300,000 F to renovate the family home. Most of the prior loans she obtained were used to pay for having her house built and furnished, in addition to day-to-day expenses.

loans.use: to finance the renovation of the family home.

loans.name: Evelyny Karol

texts.es:
Evelyny es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras”  ubicado en el distrito Juliaca, provincia San Román  y departamento de Puno, tiene 29 años de edad, de estado civil soltera y  no tiene hijos, la señorita cuentacon educación secundaria.

Viene trabajando  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 02 meses,  y su primer préstamo fue de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  utilizó para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio fabricación de polos, buzos.

La señorita solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de  S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en materiales como un rollo de tela, hilos para su negocio confección de polos, en el negocio trabaja con su mamá.
	
Su sueño para el futuro  es tener mas maquinas, tener su casa y su carro.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo y la puntualidad
texts.en:
Evelyny is a member of the “Las Mensajeras” communal bank located in Juliaca District, San Román Province and Puno Department.  She’s 29 years old, single and has no children.  She completed secondary education.

She’s been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for two months.  Her first loan was for 500 new soles that she used to increase capital in her business making polo shirts and sweatshirts.

She will ask for a new loan in the amount of 500 new soles to buy a bolt of fabric and thread for her polo making business; she works in the business with her mother.

Her dream for the future is to have more machines, a house and a car.  What she likes best about her communal bank is the ease of loans and the punctuality.

loans.use: to buy a bolt of fabric and thread.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a seafood culture business in the Philippines.

Letecia requested a PHP 27000 loan through NWTF to buy fingerlings for her seafood culture.

She has been in this business for 6 years now, and also earns additional income from hog raising.

In the future, Letecia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fingerlings for her seafoods culture.

loans.name: Lucia Silvia

texts.es:
Lucia es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras”  ubicado en el distrito Juliaca, provincia San Román  y departamento de Puno, tiene 59 años de edad, de estado civil casada y tiene 02 hijos, (1 independiente.  La señora estudio educación superior incompleto.

Viene trabajando  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos hace 06 años,  nos cuenta que su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio venta de revistas  y periódicos.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de  S/. 1400.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá en la mercadería como revistas, folletos, etc. También comprara mercadería para carnavales en el negocio le ayuda su esposo, también trabaja en textileria.
	
Su sueño para el futuro  es prosperar más en el negocio y la superación de sus hijos.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo, reuniones, las charlas y la solidaridad
texts.en:
Lucia is a member of the “Las Mensajeras” communal bank located in Juliaca District, San Román Province and Puno Department.  She’s 59 years old, married and has two children (one independent).  She did not complete higher education.

She’s been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for six years.  She tells us that her initial loan was for 300 new soles that was to increase capital in her business selling magazines and newspapers.

She will ask for a new loan in the amount of 1400 new soles to buy merchandise like magazines, pamphlets, etc.  She will also buy merchandise for carnivals.  Her husband helps her with the business.  She also works in textiles.

Her dream for the future is to make more progress in the business and that her children get ahead.  What she likes best about her communal bank is the ease of loans, the meetings, the talks and the solidarity.

loans.use: to buy magazines, pamphlets and articles for carnival.

loans.name: Piseth

texts.en:
Piseth, 28, is married, resides with her parents, her husband and one child in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been running a beauty salon and renting costumes for wedding ceremonies for over three years, earning approximately USD 7 per day. 

Her husband is employed as a bodyguard and earns about USD 4 per day. In order to improve her business, Piseth is requesting fa loan of USD 600 to purchase more wedding costumes to rent. This loan would enable her to get fashionable clothes to rent and generate more income to support the family. 

In the future, she would like to use the further profit to expand her business and help her child get a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to purchase more wedding costumes for renting.

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.es:
María es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras”  ubicado en el distrito Juliaca, provincia San Román  y departamento de Puno, tiene 45 años de edad, de estado civil casada, con dos hijos en estudio, la señora estudio educación primaria.

María trabaja hace tres ciclos con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos,  la primer vez se hizo un préstamo de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que invirtió en su tienda de abarrotes, también se dedica a la venta de tejidos (prendas de vestir).

En la actualidad solicitara un nuevo préstamo por la suma de  S/. 700.00 nuevos soles, préstamo que invertirá en la compra de 15 kilos de lanas de diferentes colores, para su confección de pantalones, ropa para bebes, la señora lo vende la plaza de San José y dominical de la ciudad de Juliaca, en los negocios le ayuda su esposo también trabaja en construcción civil..
	
Su sueño para el futuro  es tener más maquinas de tejer y ser mayorista en le negocio.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la ganancia del ahorro.
texts.en:
María is a member of the “Las Mensajeras” communal bank located in Juliaca District, San Román Province and Puno Department.  She’s 45 years old, married and has two children who are attending school.  She attended elementary school.

María has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for three cycles.  The first time she took out a loan it was for 300 new soles that she used to invest in her grocery store; she also sells knit items (articles of clothing).

She is currently asking for a new loan in the amount of 700 new soles to buy 15 kilos of wool yarn in assorted colors to make pants and clothes for infants.  She sells in San José square and during the Juliaca Sunday street market.  Her husband helps her in the business and also works in civil construction.

Her dream for the future is to have more knitting machines and to become a wholesaler.  What she likes best about her communal bank is the earning she makes on her savings.

loans.use: to buy 15 kilos of wool yarn in assorted colors to make pants.

loans.name: Sherkhon

texts.ru: Более 10 лет Шерхон занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Шерхон выращивает пшеницу, кукурузу, картошку, арахис и рис. Он очень трудолюбивый и урожай, который  получает  продает на рынке. Его продукты являются очень высококачественными на рынке, и имеет много клиентов. Шерхон хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов.
texts.en: Sherkhon has been growing crops for over 10 years. He is a very hardworking and conscientious man. Sherkhon grows wheat, corn, potatoes, peanuts, and rice. He is very hardworking and he sell what he harvests at the market. His goods are seen as very high quality at the market and he has many customers. Sherkhon would like a loan to buy mineral fertilizers, fuel, and lubricants.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Francia Edith

texts.es: FRANCIA DE 63 AÑOS VIVE ( SUBURBIO GUAYAQUIL) . ELLA CON MUCHA DEDICACION DESPUES DE LA PERDIDA DE SU ESPOSO  LA CLIENTE SE VIO EN LA NECESIDAD DE PONERCE UN NEGOCIO  CON LA FINALIDAD DE SUSTITUIRSE CON SU familia .  CON ESFUERSO TRABAJA TODOS LOS DIAS CO SU HIJO MAYOR DE 6:00 A 23:00. A futuro ella quiere tener un negocio muy amplio para mostrar su mercadería. Con el préstamo comprara (alimentos) como arroz, bebidas, confites, dulces etc.
texts.en:
Francia is 63, and lives in a suburb of Guayaquil. After the loss of her husband, she found it necessary to set up a business, so that she and her family could survive-- and she did so with much determination. She works hard every day with her eldest son, from 6:00am to 11:00pm.

In the future she wants to have a very spacious business to display her merchandise. She will use the loan to buy food products such as rice, drinks, candy and sweets.

loans.use: To buy rice, drinks and candy.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
Manuela es socia del Banco Comunal “Las Mensajeras”  ubicado en el distrito Juliaca, provincia San Román  y departamento de Puno, tiene 47 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente y tiene 03 hijos (02 independientes), la señora estudió hasta 5to de educación  secundaria.

Viene trabajando  con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace 08 años,  su primer préstamo fue de S/. 300.00 nuevos soles, dinero que  le sirvió para  incrementar el capital de  su negocio de fabricación y venta de puertas, mesas, sillas y otros muebles de madera.

La señora solicitará un nuevo crédito por la suma de  S/. 3000.00 nuevos soles, dinero que invertirá comprando materiales para su taller de carpintería como madera, 20 planchas de triplay, tiner, cola, lijar para la elaboración de roperos, puertas, mesas, sillas y otros muebles.
	
Su sueño para el futuro  es tener una casa.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  son las reuniones por que intercambiamos palabras con las socias, y nos relajamos.
texts.en:
Manuela is a member of the “Las Mensajeras” communal bank located in Juliaca District, San Román Province and Puno Department.  She’s 47 years old and has a spouse and three children (two independent).  She completed fifth grade of secondary school.

She’s been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for 8 years.  Her first loan was for 300 new soles that she used to increase capital in her business manufacturing and selling doors, tables, chairs and other wood furniture.

She will request a new loan in the amount of 3000 new soles to buy supplies for her carpentry shop like wood, 20 sheets of plywood, thinner, glue and sandpaper to make armoires, doors, tables, chairs and other furniture.

Her dream in future is to own a house.  What she likes best about her communal bank is the meetings because they chat among the fellow members and relax.

loans.use: to buy 20 sheets of plywood, thinner, glue, sandpaper, etc.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.es:
Dominga es socia del Banco Comunal “las Mujeres de Santa Rosa de Arapa II”  ubicado en el distrito de Arapa, provincia  Azángaro y departamento de Puno, tiene 19 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene un hijo, estudio hasta 3ro de educación secundaria.
 
Trabaja desde hace un ciclo con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su primer préstamo fue por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de animales.

En la actualidad solicitara un nuevo préstamo por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que utilizará para comprar chanchos y ovejas, la señora cuenta que los compra de diferentes ferias de la localidad, en el negocio le ayuda su esposo también trabaja en construcción civil.

Su sueño para el futuro  es tener un carro para hacerlo trabajar.

Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal  es la facilidad del préstamo
texts.en:
Dominga is a member of the “Las Mujeres de Santa Rosa de Arapa II” communal bank located in Arapa District, Azángaro Province and Puno Department.  She’s 19 years old and has a spouse and a son.  She studied up to third grade of secondary school.

She’s been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for one cycle.  Her first loan was in the amount of 500 new soles that she invested in her business selling animals.

She will currently request a new loan in the amount of 500 new soles to buy pigs and sheep.  She tells us that she buys them in various local livestock markets.  Her husband helps her with the business and also works in civil construction.

Her dream for the future is to own a car to put to work.  What she likes best about her communal bank is the ease of the loan.

loans.use: to buy pigs and sheep.

loans.name: Mame Fatim

texts.fr: Madame Mame Fatim est âgée  de 60 ans et vit au Sénégal. C’est une veuve,  parent bénéficiaire, qui s’active depuis plus de 10 ans dans la vente d’habits, de tissus, fruits  et légumes. Elle a choisi cette activité de commerce dans le but de lutter contre l’inactivité. L’aspect qui l’intéresse  le plus dans son activité  est le fait de s’occuper et la satisfaction qu’elle  procure à ses clients. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC de sa zone d’habitation depuis mars 2000. Elle y a  déjà remboursé 13 crédits antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de fruits et légumes destinés à la vente. Son crédit servira a mieux développer sa vente de fruits et légumes et aussi augmenter  les bénéfices qu’elle gagne. Les financements qui lui sont consentis ont un très grand impact dans la vie sociale du sociétaire car elle est parvenue à réaliser beaucoup de choses avec ses prêts.
texts.en: Madame Mame Fatim is 60 years old and lives in Senegal. She is widowed  and a recipient parent; she has sold clothes, fabric, fruit and vegetables for over ten years.  She chose this trade in order to fight against unemployment. The part of her job that she loves is the satisfaction that she gives her customers. She has been a member of one of U-IMCEC's divisions in her local area since March 2000. She has already repaid 13 previous loans. She is seeking a 100 000 frs loan in order to buy fruit and vegetables for re-sale. Her loan will enable her to develop her fruit and vegetable business, and also to boost her profits. The loans that she receives have a large impact on her social life, as she has been able to achieve many things with her loans.

loans.use: To purchase fruit and vegetables for re-sale

loans.name: Baba

texts.fr: Monsieur Baba est un homme de 42 ans qui habite dans une des localités sénégalaises. C’est un agent de sécurité qui évolue en meme temps dans le secteur du commerce. Il a une expérience de 5 ans dans ses activités. Il a choisi cette activité de commerce pour arrondir  les fins de mois. Il est membre du guichet de l’U-IMCEC de la localité depuis novembre 2009. Il sollicite un crédit de 250 000 frs prévu pour l’approvisionner en poissons qu’il  va vendre aux  revendeurs. Il détient une carte de mareyeur .L’accroissement de ses revenus lui  permet d’améliorer son niveau de vie.
texts.en: Monsieur Baba is a 42 year old man who lives in a community in Senegal. He is a security guard who also works in the trade sector. He has 5 years work experience in these activities. He chose to work as a trader in order to round-up his salary. He has been a member of the community branch of U-IMCEC since November 2009. He is requesting a loan of 250,000 frs so that he can buy fish that he can sell to retailers. He holds a wholesale trader's card. The increase in his revenues will enables him to improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fish for resale

loans.name: Ararat

texts.ru:
Арарат занимается сельским хозяйством в селе Тандзавер, Сьюникского региона, более 16 лет. Он разводит крупный рогатый скот, кур и свиней, а также выращивает овощи и фрукты. У Арарата имеется участок земли, который служит  пастбищем для скота. Большую часть полученной сельскохозяйственной продукции, а именно: овощи, фрукты, говядину, свинину, молоко и яйца Арарат продает своим постоянным клиентам в городе Капане и скупщикам в своей деревне.
Арарату 45 лет и он проживает в деревне Тандзавер. По специальности он маляр, но в данный момент он работает ночным сторожем в сельской школе, а в дневное время занимается сельским хозяйством. Арарат женат, и у него есть сына и дочь. Сын Арарата учится в школе, дочь учится в магистратуре на платном отделении и параллельно работает учительницей армянского языка и литературы в школе. Жена Арарата работает уборщицей в сельской школе. 
Сумма кредита в 1.000.000 драм необходима Арарату для покупки трех свиней, трех бычков, а также корма для животных.
texts.en:
Ararat has been a farmer in the village of Tandzaver, Syunik province, for over 16 years. He raises cattle, chickens, and swine, and also grows fruits and vegetables. Ararat has a parcel of land that serves as pasture for the animals. He sells a large part of what he produces, specifically vegetables, fruit, beef, pork, milk, and eggs to regular customers in the city of Kapan and buyers in his town. 

Ararat is 45 years old and lives in Tandzaver. He is a housepainter by profession but he currently works nights as a guard at the town school and works on his farm in the daytime. Ararat is married and has a son and daughter. His son is in school and his daughter is in a paid Masters degree program while also teaching Armenian language and literature in a school. His wife is a janitor in the local school. 

Ararat needs a loan of 1,000,000 dram to buy three pigs, three bull calves, and animal feed.

loans.use: To buy 3 pigs, 3 bull-calves and fodder for his farm animals

loans.name: 74-Las Julianas Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento 74-LAS JULIANAS esta compuesto de ocho integrantes, siete mujeres y un varón, La presidenta del banco es la Sra. Eligia que fue elegida por su responsabilidad y la solidaridad con sus compañeras, La Sra. Eligia se dedica  a la elaboración y  venta de comida en su puesto de venta que se encuentran en la zona de Virgen de Lujan. Este préstamo es la primera secuencia dentro de la institución la Sra. Eligia         utilizara  este préstamo  para la Compra de mesas y sillas plásticas para  implementar en su puesto de venta ya que se incremento su clientela y ella quiere brindarles mayor comodidad. Su razón para solicitar este préstamo es Hacer crecer el negocio. Eligia enfrenta retos en su negocio que son  La competencia del mercado y utilizara los beneficios para mejorar su calidad de vida, se siente muy feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
The 74-Las Julianas communal bank is made up of eight members: seven women and one man. The president of the communal bank is Eligia who was chosen for her sense of responsibility and solidarity with her fellow members. Eligia makes and sells food for a living at her kiosk which is located in the Virgen de Lujan area.

This loan is the first in the loan cycle for this microfinance institution. Eligia will use this loan to purchase plastic chairs and tables for her kiosk as her clientele has increased, and she wants to make them more comfortable. She seeks this loan to expand her business.

Eligia faces challenges in her business such as market competition. She will use the profits to improve her quality of life. She is extremely happy and grateful to the microfinance institution for the support given.

loans.use: to purchase plastic chairs and tables

loans.name: Fmat Group

texts.fr: Le GIE FMAT ( Fédération des maraichers Agriculteurs de Touba Toul) se compose de femmes et d'hommes qui pratiquent le maraîchage.Ils cultivent des légumes ( salade, choux, pommes de terres, oignons...) sur deux hectares derrière le village.La vente de leur production permet de générer des revenus qu'ils divisent en trois parts: la première est gardée comme fonds de roulement, la seconde comme fonds de sécurité dans leur compte à l'UIMCEC et la troisième est partagée entre les membres. Ces derniers parviennent à s'occuper correctement de leurs familles avec les bénéfices tirés de l'activité.Le responsable du GIE  ( à gauche, en casquette) est marié et père de quatre enfants dont les deux vont à l'école.En plus de l'agriculture, il pratique le commerce pour diversifier ses revenus. Aujourd'hui, le GIE sollicite un pret de 990 000 f pour acheter des semences et du petit matériel afin d'agrandir leur exploitation. Ils ambitionne de faire de celle -ci un ferme agricole et d'élevage.
texts.en: The Economic Interest Group FMAT (Federation of Market Gardeners of Touba Toul) consists of men and women who practice market gardening. They grow vegetables (lettuce, cabbage, potatoes, onions, etc.) on two hectares of land behind the village. By selling their produce they are able to generate income that is split three ways: the first part is retained as working capital, the second part is kept as a security fund in their UIMCEC account and the third part is shared between the members of the group. The members of the group are able to take care of their families with the profits of this activity. The leader of the GIE (on the left in a hat) is married with four children, two of whom go to school. In addition to agriculture, he also trades in order to diversify his income. Today, the Economic Interest Group is requesting a loan of 990,000 francs to buy seeds and small equipment so that they can expand their farm. Their aim is to turn the activity into an agricultural and livestock farm.

loans.use: to buy seeds and small equipment

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
JOSE MANUEL tiene  26 años de edad es casado no tiene hijos, vive  con la esposa en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

Es integrante de la Vrc Nuevos Horizontes, la comunidad se encuentra a unos 40 minutos en la comunidad santa Martha perteneciente al Cantón Guaranda.

JOSE MANUEL se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de caña de azúcar y mora además se dedica  al venta de panelas, mora, también cría animales como pollos y cerdos.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, fertilizantes,  líquidos para la maleza y urea. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la producción. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada 15 días.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las malas vías, muchas lluvias. El sueño es poder comprarse una camioneta para poder transportar los productos y para venderlos.  En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y disfrutar jugando boly.
texts.en:
Jose Manuel is 26 years old, married with no children and lives with his wife in the Guaranda Bolivar province.

He is a member of the “VR Nuevos Horizontes” [Ventanillas Rurales (VR) Windows to the Countryside New Horizons], the community is located about 40 minutes from the Santa Martha community which is part of the Canton Guaranda region.

Jose works in farming and the cultivation of sugarcane and berries.  He also sells unrefined whole cane sugar, berries and raises animals such as chickens and pigs.

He requests a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, weed killer. With the help of this loan, he hopes to increase production. Every 15 days he goes to Guaranda to buy and sell.

The challenges he faces are the bad roads and a lot of rain. His dream is to buy a truck to transport his products and to sell them. During his free time he likes to rest and enjoy playing volleyball.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, urea, and liquids

loans.name: Ndeye Khary

texts.fr: Madame Ndeye   Khary est âgée  de 60 ans. Elle évolue depuis plus de 8 ans dans le commerce, c'est-à-dire l’achat et la vente de vaisselles, bijoux. Elle  fait aussi des prestations de services dans un local qui se situe au niveau du marché de la localité ou elle exerce son activité. Elle s’active aussi dans  la location de chaises. Elle a choisi ses  activités de commerce  et de prestation de services  dans le but de lutter contre l’oisiveté.  Et ce qui l’intéresse  surtout ce sont les échanges avec la population et les retombées financières. Elle et membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis février 2007. Elle a déjà remboursé 4 prêts  antérieurs. Elle  sollicite un crédit de  500 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de  nouveaux produits( vaisselles, bijoux etc.), ce qui lui permettra de renforcer le stock de sa boutique. L’accroissement de ses bénéfices lui permet de gérer ses besoins personnels sociaux elle-même sans l’aide de personne.
texts.en: Madame Ndeye Khary is 60 years old. She has been working in trade for more than 8 years, i.e. buying and selling crockery and jewellery. She also provides services in premises located on a level of the market in the community where she has her business. She is involved in the rental of chairs. She chose to work in trade and providing services in order to combat idleness. What she enjoys most of all is the contact with the public and the financial benefits. She has been a member of one of the branches of U-IMCEC since February 2007. She has already paid back four previous loans. She is requesting a loan of 500,000 francs in order to buy new products (crockery, jewellery etc..), so that she can build the stock of her shop. The increase in profits will enable her to manage her personal and social needs without asking for anyone else's help.

loans.use: to buy crockery and jewellery for resale

loans.name: Awa Faye

texts.fr: Madame Awa Faye est une femme mariée qui est âgée  de 39 ans. Elle habite dans une des localités villageoises du Sénégal  et évolue depuis plus de 10 ans dans le commerce et la restauration. Elle a choisi ses activités  par opportunité.  Ce qui l’intéresse  le plus ce sont les contacts  avec les clients, les  services qu’elle rend a la population et les flux financiers qui se dégagent de son activité.  Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis novembre 2007. Elle a déjà remboursé  3 crédits antérieurs et sollicite un prêt de 400 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’une nouvelle cantine pour les besoins de son activité. Ses crédits antérieurs lui ont permis d’acquérir le  matériel  d’exploitation lui permettant d’exploiter correctement son activité.
texts.en: Madame Awa Faye is a married 39 year-old. She lives in a village in Senegal and has worked in catering for over ten years. She chose her trade opportunistically. The things she likes most about her work are the contact she has with customers, the services she offers and the revenue her business generates. She has been a member of her local U-IMCEC division since November  2007. She has already repaid three loans and is seeking a 400 000 frs loan in order to purchase a dining hall. Her previous loans have enabled her to purchase tools and equipment that have enabled her to run her business effectively.

loans.use: To purchase a dining hall

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fabric to make clothing in his shop.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria, se dedica  a la venta de muñecos de peluches de forma ambulante pero también cuenta con los ingresos de su esposo ya que el trabaja como cerrajero.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de ladrillo, estuco y pintura para la refacción de una habitación en su casa para dar más comodidad a su familia.
Maria, es casada y tiene dos hijos, viven en casa de sus padres en la zona Las Lomas de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la sexta vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la tercera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
María works selling stuffed toys in an ambulatory manner but also relies on income from her husband who works as a locksmith.  She needs the loan to remodel a room in her house to provide more comfort for her family. 

María is married and has two children.  They live in her parents' house in the city of La Paz's Las Lomas zone. 


This is the sixth time she's worked with IMPRO and the third with KIVA.

loans.use: to purchase brick, stucco, and paint to refurbish a room in her home

loans.name: Roman

texts.es:
Román, trabaja como empleado en una empresa privada en el área de contabilidad.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de un inodoro nuevo para refaccionar de uno de los baños de su vivienda con la finalidad de dar más comodidad a su familia.
ROMAN, es soltero y tiene dos hijas con las cuales vive en casa de sus padres en la zona Alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en: Román is employed at a private firm in the accounting department.  He needs the loan to furnish one of the bathrooms in his house to provide more comfort for his family.  Román is single and has two daughters he lives with  in his parents' house in the city of La Paz's Alto San Pedro zone.  This is the first time he's worked with IMPRO and first with KIVA.

loans.use: to purchase a new toilet to refurbish the bathroom in her home

loans.name: Pacifico

texts.es:
Pacifico ha estado trabajando sin descanso y su movilidad ha sido utilizada al 100 %.Pacífico, trabaja como chofer propietario dentro de un sindicato de transportes de la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de su vehiculo ya que es el único ingreso que tiene para mantener a su familia.
Pacífico, es casado y tiene tres hijos, vive en la zona Gran Poder la misma ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la quinta vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la cuarta vez  con KIVA.
texts.en:
Pacifico has been working without a break, and his transportation has been utilized at 100% capacity.  Pacifico works for himself as a driver, and is part of a transportation syndicate in the city of La Paz.

The loan that he is requesting is for maintenance of his vehicle, as this is the only source of income that he has for supporting his family.

Pacifico is married with three children.  He lives in the Gran Poder neighborhood of La Paz city.

This is his fifth time working with IMPRO, and his fourth time with Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance for his vehicle for passenger transportation.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is forty-two years old and married with two children.

Gina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her store.

Gina has borrowed and paid for ten loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for eight years and also earns an income from hog raising.

Gina aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her store.

loans.name: Chenda

texts.en:
Chenda, forty, is married, and resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She is a cloth weaver. Additionally, she is involved in growing mushrooms to sell. She earns approximately USD 6 per day. Her husband is a construction worker who earns about USD 6 per day. 

In order to improve her business, Chenda is requesting a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase silk to weave more cloth to sell. In the future, she would like to run an additional business raising pigs to generate more income to support the family. Moreover, she plans to build a new concrete house and help her children get bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase silk to weave into cloth to sell.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
Félix, trabaja como empleado en una imprenta y también percibe ingresos ya que confecciona  chamarras junto a su esposa  en un ambiente dentro de su casa.
El crédito lo requiere para la refacción del muro lateral izquierdo de contención en su vivienda para dar más seguridad a su familia, ya que el  muro está muy deteriorado.
Félix, es casado y tiene dos hijos con los cuales vive en la zona 16de Febrero la misma ubicada en la ciudad de El Alto.
Es la quinta vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la tercera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en: Félix works as an employee in a print shop and also earns income making jackets with his wife in a space at home.  He needs the loan to repair a wall in his house to provide more security for his family since the wall is quite damaged.  Félix is married and has two children that live with him in the city of El Alto’s 16 de Febrero zone.  This is the fifth time he’s worked with IMPRO and the third with KIVA.

loans.use: to repair the lateral left wall in her home

loans.name: Jackelyn

texts.en:
Jackelyn is a married woman who has three children. Jackelyn is twenty-eight years old, and resides in Gabunon, Tambulig, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Jackelyn owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products to earn a living. She's been in this business for five years and each month she earns 3,000 PHP from it.

She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase items such as shampoo, milo (chocolate and malt powdered drink), soap and other products to sell. This year, Jackelyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Jackelyn wants to build house and to support her children to finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase items such as shampoo, milo and soap to sell.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma works hard to support her family. She is married and has a firewood sales business in the Philippines.

Wilma requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy firewood to sell.

She has been in this business for eighteen years.

In the future, Wilma would like to save money to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy firewood to sell.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores is fifty-four years old and married with three children.

Dolores works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy items like snack foods, groceries, etc. to sell in her general store.

Dolores has borrowed and paid for six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from selling vegetables and fruits.

Dolores aspires to save enough money to build a restaurant in the market.

loans.use: to buy items like snack foods and groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Oscar

texts.es:
La tienda de abarrotes de su propiedad está funcionando muy bien.
Oscar, trabaja también como chofer propietario dentro de un sindicato en la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de su vehiculo ya que es la fuente adicional de ingresos que tiene para ayudar a su familia.
Oscar, es casado y no tiene hijos, vive en la casa de sus padres en la zona Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la tercera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la tercera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Oscar's grocery store is functioning very well.

Oscar also works for himself as a driver, and is a member of a syndicate in the city of La Paz.  The loan that he is requesting is for the maintenance of his vehicle, as it is his source of additional income to support his family.

Oscar is married with no children.  He lives in his parents' home in the Pasankeri neighborhood of La Paz city.

This is his third time working with IMPRO and also his third time with Kiva.

loans.use: to cover the maintenance costs for his passenger transportation vehicle.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina es una joven de 24 años  vive en casa de sus padres con su  pequeño  hijo, en la Zona de Huajchilla de la ciudad de La Paz. La actividad de  la cliente es la venta de flores feria de la ciudad de La Paz todos los dias, compra la mercadería de mayoristas de otra comunidad, es un trabajo muy sacrificado tanto para ella como para su pequeño hijo, ya que en varias oportunidades va con él a  las 4:30 de a mañana, hora en la que llega la mercadería,  para  descargar  y acomodar en su puesto para la venta. Esta actividad la realiza 2 días a la semana es decir sábados y domingos,   ya que también presta sus servicios como empleada domestica y jardinería de lunes a viernes, por el desempeño de estas dos actividades Marina es una mujer muy trabajadora y responsable de su pequeño hijo. El crédito que solicita es para su capital de operación, con lo cual comprara  mercadería y de esa manera diversificara las flores que vende.
texts.en:
Marina is a 24-year-old young woman.  She lives in her parents' house with her small child in the Huajchilla area of the city of La Paz.

The work she does is selling flowers in the market of the city of La Paz.  She buys the merchandise from wholesalers in another community.  It is a very demanding job, both for her and for her small child, because sometimes he goes with her at 4:30 in the morning, the time at which the merchandise arrives, to unload and get her stall ready for selling.

She does this job two days a week; Saturdays and Sundays, that is, because she also works as a domestic employee and gardener from Monday through Friday.  Because of her diligence in these two activities, Marina is a very hardworking woman, and responsible about her young son.

The loan she is requesting is for her operating capital, with which she will buy merchandise and in this way diversify the flowers she sells.

loans.use: to have operating capital to buy flowers.

loans.name: Lanie

texts.en: This time, for her 14th cycle loan, Lanie is borrowing Php 30,000 to fund her fishing and hog-raising business. This business was previously funded through NWTF and Kiva and continues to provide her and her family with income that is improving their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials for her fishing business such as nylon and bamboo, as well as feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es:
Ubaldina es una Sra. muy  trabajadora y responsable. Ella es soltera y vive en casa propia en compañía de su hermano y su sobrina a quien tiene como a una hija, ya que ella no tiene hijos.
Ubaldina es muy sacrificada y humilde, tiene una despensa que había empezado con su madre hace más de 30 años. En el año 1984 viajó a Estados Unidos en busca de trabajo como empleada doméstica ya que en ese entonces el dinero le alcanzaba apenas para comer, luego volvió después de cinco años con un mejor estado económico, invirtió mucho dinero por su casa y su despensa, luego en el 2007 volvió a viajar al mismo país del cual volvió luego de cuatro años en el 2011. Hoy en día solo se dedica a atender en su despensa a todos sus clientes de la zona que prefieren su local debido a la humilde y respetuosa atención que les ofrece la citada señora.
Ella solicitó el crédito para compra de comestibles, bebidas, lácteos, hortalizas y demás, con lo cual podrá cargar más su despensa y tenerla bien surtida.
texts.en:
Ubaldina is a very hard-working and responsible lady.  She is single and lives in her own home together with her brother and her niece who she thinks of as a daughter as she doesn't have children herself.

Ubaldina is a very selfless and humble woman.  She has a grocery store that she set up together with her mother more than 30 years ago.  In 1984 she traveled to the United States in search of work as a domestic employee because, back then, the money she made barely covered her food costs.  After five years she returned in a better financial position and invested a lot of money in her home and grocery store.  Then in 2007 she traveled once again to the same country and returned after four years in 2011.  These days she works serving in her grocery store.  She serves all the customers in her area who prefer her business because of the humble and respectful service she offers them.

Ubaldina requested this loan to buy food products, drinks, dairy products, vegetables etc. so that she can further supply her store and keep it well stocked.

loans.use: to buy items with which to stock her store

loans.name: Kuña Aty Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre kuña Aty se conformó en el año 2011, se encuentran en el primer ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya. Ellas son muy trabajadoras y luchadoras y comentan que siempre se esfuerzan al máximo para poder dar a sus familias lo mejor.
La Sra.  Nilda  es presidenta del comité, y ella se  dedica a la venta de ropas, también a la venta de leche, y queso. Cuenta que de recibir el crédito podrá invertir en comprar las ropas y tener más en su stock de esta  manera y tener más ingreso y mejorar su nivel de vida. y poder darles una mejor vida a sus hijos ya que ella es madre soltera.
Ella agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo por parte de la fundación paraguaya y de kiva. Ellas están muy contentas por formar parte del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación.
texts.en:
The group Kuña Aty was formed in 2011, and is in their first stage of programming with the women's entrepreneurs of the Paraguayan Foundation. They are very hardworking and do their best to provide for their families.
Nilda is the group's president and sells clothing, milk and cheese.  She plans to invest this credit in buying clothing articles to increase her stock for sales, to generate more revenue to improve her economic situation.  As she is a single mother, she hopes to give her children a better future.
She is grateful for this opportunity from the the Paraguayan Foundation and Kiva.  The women are very pleased to be part of the women's program of the foundation.

loans.use: to buy clothing for re-sale.

loans.name: Joseline

texts.en:
Joesline lives in Yei. She sells charcoal, and has been in business for one year. She is thirty years old, married, and has five children; all of them are still in school. 

Joesline heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Rosalia is fifty-eight years old and married with eight children.

Rosalia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a variety store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like snack foods, soft-drinks, noodles etc.

Rosalia has borrowed and paid for seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the variety store for two years and also earns an income from fishing.

Rosalia aspires to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like snack foods, soft-drinks and noodles.

loans.name: Maurecia

texts.en:
Maurecia, forty-seven years old, lives in Digson, Bonifacio, Misamis Occidental with her two children. She opened a grocery store five years ago and she gets 8,000 PHP monthly. 

Now she needs to buy more to increase her stock of ready-to-wear, so she decided to ask a for a microcredit loan of 15,000 PHP from GDMPC.  She has been a partner of Kiva and GDMPC since 2011. Therefore she hopes she will develop her business to gain more profit.

loans.use: to increase her stock of ready-to-wear.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry 3 Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Kuña Katupyry III se conformó el año pasado y con mucho esfuerzo ya  se encuentran en el 2° ciclo, ellas trabajan para poder ayudarse y de esa forma mejorar las condiciones de vidas de sus familias.  Ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras y por sobre todo responsables.
Yolanda se dedica a la costura y nos cuenta que hace todo tipo de prendas y vestidos, es muy buena en lo que hace, y prueba de ello es la clientela que tiene. Su meta es seguir trabajando y ayudando a su familia en el día a día.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de  telas, hilos, botones, y demás insumos necesarios para poder hacer los pedidos que tiene. Agradece por la ayuda que ha recibido de fundación y de kiva.
texts.en:
The committee of women named 'Kuña Katupyry III' was formed in the last year, with much effort. They are in their second loan cycle. They work to be able to help themselves and in this way help to improve the living conditions of their families. They are very hard workers and entrepreneurs, and above all responsible.   

Yolanda makes a living as a seamstress. She told us that she makes all types of clothing and dresses. She is very good at what she does, a testimony to this is the clientele she has. Her goal is to keep working and helping her family day to day. 

She has requested a loan to buy fabric, thread, buttons and other necessary supplies to be able to complete the orders that she has. She is thankful for the help that she has received from the foundation and from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and buttons, etc.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El comité La Esperanza  se formó con la unión de 15 vecinas de la ciudad de Mariano Roque Alonso, donde todas las integrantes del comité desarrollan actividades independientes, pero también en forma grupal para fomentar su compañerismo.  Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo.
La Señora Pamela es una de las integrantes del comité, ella tiene una despensa en su casa .Ella tiene  1 hijo y su marido es enfermero. Se encuentra muy satisfecha con sus actividades y las capacitaciones que recibe el grupo., y gracias a estas ha podido salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, carne, lácteos, hortalizas y demás insumos necesarios para poder surtir su local. Ellas están muy contentas por la ayuda que están recibiendo en la fundación y por parte de kiva.
texts.en:
The communal bank La Esperanza was formed by 15 neighbors in the city of Mariano Roque Alonso, where all the bank members carry out activities independently and work as a group to promote their fellowship. The members are a very united group, capable of working together on activities that strengthen their friendship.

Pamela is one of the members of the communal bank. She has a grocery store in her house. She has 1 child and her husband is a nurse. She is very happy with their activities and the training the group receives. Because of them she has been able to get ahead and improve her family's situation. 

She is requesting the loan to buy beverages, meats, dairy products, vegetables, and the other supplies she needs to stock space.They are very happy for the help they are receiving from the foundation and from Kiva.

loans.use: to buy supplies to stock her grocery store.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
Celia  tiene 35 años, vive en casa propia en la Ciudad de Carapeguá. Ella es artesana en encaje yu, hace 10 años que se dedica a eso, como toda sus hermanas. Es casada, tiene tres hijos todos menores. Su esposo esta por la Argentina, y le ayuda con un poco de dinero que le envía desde allá.
Ella además de hacer encajes tiene una pequeña cantina, que también le deja un buen ingreso, ya que su casa está situada muy cerca de un colegio.
Solicito el crédito para la compra de hilos y materiales para la confección de más encajes, ya que esto le deja un muy buen ingreso. Es una persona emprendedora y trabajadora, son valores que resaltan sus vecinos.
texts.en:
Celia is 35 years old.  She lives in her own come in the city of Carapeguá.  She is an artisan who makes lace.  She has been making her living from her handicraft for the last 10 years, just like all of her sisters.  Celia is married and has three young children.  Her husband is in Argentina, and he helps her by sending some money from there.
In addition to making lace, Celia has a small Cantina, which also gives her a decent income, as her home is located very close to a school.
Celia is requesting the loan to purchase thread and materials for making more lace, as this earns her a decent income.  She is an enterprising and hard-working person, values that her neighbors emphasize.

loans.use: to purchase thread and other materials for making lace.

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер житель Яванского района. Ему 25 лет. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Его брат работает в России. Сам он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности занимается четыре года. Кроме того у него при доме имеется участок земли, где он со всей семьей занимается выращиванием селскохозяйственных культур. Кредит берет для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Alisher is a resident of the Yavan region. He is 25 years old, married and has one child. His brother is working in Russia. Alisher makes earn a living by breeding large horned cattle. He has been in this business for four years. He also has a plot of land by his home where he cultivates crops together with his family. Alisher is taking out the loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Seyni Paye

texts.fr: Madame Seyni Paye est âgée  de 49 ans. Elle est mariée et s’active depuis plus de 10 ans dans le commerce  d’habits, de foulards et de produits divers. La raison du choix de son activité reste son désir de lutter contre l’inactivité. Les flux financiers ainsi que les bénéfices que lui génère son activité sont  pour elle les aspects les plus intéressants de son travail. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis novembre 2004. Elle a déjà remboursé 7 crédits antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 150 000 frs prévu pour financer son voyage vers l’un des pays limitrophes du Sénégal dans le but de se procurer des produits qu’elle commercialise. Elle compte redémarrer son activité qu’elle avait interrompue pour des raisons de santé. Ses crédits antérieurs lui ont permis de développer son activité progressivement et d’acheter un terrain pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Mrs. Seyni Paye is a 49-year-old married woman who has been selling apparel, scarves and various other items for over ten years. She chose this occupation mainly to avoid idleness. In her opinion, the primary appeal of this activity is the cash flow and profits that it generates. 

A member of U-IMCEC since November 2004, she has previously obtained and repaid seven loans. She is now seeking a loan of 150,000F to finance a trip to a country bordering Senegal where she plans to purchase merchandise to sell. Her goal is to re-start her activity, which was put on hold due to health concerns. Past loans have allowed her to expand her activity gradually and to buy land for her children.

loans.use: to travel abroad to buy merchandise for resale.

loans.name: José

texts.es:
El Sr José tiene 42 años es comerciante hace mas de 6 años. Tiene una Despensa y Carnicería en su domicilio donde el mismo atiende. Tiene dos Hijas una de 14 años y la otra de 6 años y su señora trabaja como docente. Según don José tiene muy buena clientela porque ya se le conoce en su barrio y también porque le trata bien a sus clientes.
Cuenta que su mayor sueño es tener una propia playa de ventas de vehículos ya que ahora también está trabajando con su primo en la compraventa de vehículos, dice que para eso necesita de mucho capital pero que no pierde la esperanza ya que está trabajando bien y de a poco está creciendo.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de un novillo, el cual faenará y venderá en la carnicería que tiene. El agradece a la fundación por la oportunidad que ha recibido por parte de la fundación y de kiva.
texts.en:
José is 42 years old and has been a shopkeeper for more than six years.  He has a grocery store and butcher's shop in his home in which he serves.  José has two daughters who are 14 and 6 years old and his wife works as a teacher.  José says that he has a very good customer base because he is already well known in his neighborhood and he treats his customers well.  He says that his biggest dream is to have his own vehicle sales business because right now he is also working with his cousin buying and selling vehicles.  He says that he needs a lot of capital for this but he doesn't lose hope because he is working well and gradually growing his business.  

José is requesting a loan to buy a young bull which he will slaughter and then sell in his butcher's shop.  He is grateful for the opportunity that Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva are providing him with.

loans.use: to buy a young bull to slaughter

loans.name: Juana Joaquina

texts.es:
La señora es casada, tiene 53 años de edad, estudio su estudios de educacion primaria, tiene 2 hijos los cuales estudian, se dedica a la tejeduría de cortes típicos, inicio e4ste negocio con un solo telar, y hasta el momento lleva 30 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de hilo para mejorar su producción de tejidos, ya que en el futuro espera tener una mayor capital y mas clientes.
texts.en:
Juana Joaquina is married and is 53 years old. She has two children who go to school, and she also attended primary school. She makes a living by weaving traditional clothing. She started this business with a single loom and now she has 30 years of experience. She depends on her husband's support who makes a living in the same job.

She is requesting this loan which she will use for buying thread to improve her production of woven products. In the future, she hopes to have more capital and more customers.

loans.use: to buy thread for weaving

loans.name: Ra'no

texts.ru: Раъно проживает в районе Кубодиен. Ей 37 лет. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Ее муж находится в России. Сама она имеет высшее педагогическое образование. По профессии Раъно работает восемь лет. Кроме того она у себя дома занимается животноводством. Кредит берет для закупа телят с целью увеличения количества скота.
texts.en: Ra'no lives in the region of Qubadiyon. She is 37 years old, married and has five children. Her husband is now in Russia. She has a higher education in teaching. Ra'no has worked in the profession for eight years. She also does animal husbandry at home. She is taking out the loan to buy calves with the goal to increase the number of livestock.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
El señor Felipe, es de la ciudad de Villarrica, tiene 48 años de edad, es soltero, vive en casa propia, y nos cuenta que se dedica al comercio de prendas de vestir de hace más de 24 años.
Se había iniciado gracias a la ayuda de sus hermanos quienes todos son comerciantes de la zona, su pequeño puesto de ventas  queda ubicado en el centro comercial más  concurrido de la ciudad, vende exclusivamente prendas de vestir para caballeros, como jeans, camisas, remeras, short y otros. Solicita crédito para la compra de prendas de vestir de temporada.
Gracias a la ayuda financiera de la fundación paraguaya, ha ido aumentando el stock de mercaderías y por ende su venta, con esfuerzo comenta Felipe que con los años pudo construir su casa propia y comprar comodidades para el mismo, agradece a fundación paraguaya por el apoyo ofrecido.
texts.en:
Señor Felipe is from Villarrica.  He is 48 years old, is single and lives in his own home.  He tells us that he has made his living selling clothing for more than 24 years.
Señor Felipe got started thanks to some help from his siblings, all of whom are salespeople in the area.  His small sales post is located in the busiest shopping center in the city.  He sells exclusively men's clothing such as as jeans, shirts, t-shirts, shorts and other items.  He is requesting the loan to purchase seasonal clothing.
Thanks to the financial help from Fundación Paraguaya, Señor Felipe has been increasing his stock of merchandise and therefore his sales.  He says that with effort, over the years he was able to build his own home and to purchase creature comforts for himself.  Señor Felipe is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the support they have offered.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for re-sale.

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es:
Claudia, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de tener los materiales a la mano, para continuar elaborando tamales, por eso comprara maíz, condimentos, aceite, pollo, verduras, hojas de banano. Esta compra le ayudara para mejorar el negocio y la disponibilidad de productos para seguir trabajando.
Ella considera que a través de estos préstamos, ha generado un aumento en su producción y ganancias familiares. Este es su segundo prestamo.
texts.en:
Claudia is applying for a new loan because she needs to have the materials on hand to continue making tamales. She will buy corn, condiments, cooking oil, chicken, vegetables and banana leaves. This purchase will help her to improve her business and have the products she needs available to continue working.

She believes that through these loans she has generated an increase in her production and family income. This is her second loan.

loans.use: to buy corn, condiments, cooking oil, chicken, vegetables and banana leaves.

loans.name: Kizlarkhon

texts.ru: Кизлархон замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Она очень воспитанная и трудолюбивая женщина, которая очень старается улучшить свое благосостояние семьи. Более 6 лет она занимается выращиванием картошки, лук и овес. В основном она занимается картофелеводством, каждый год получает большой урожай и продает на рынке за хорошую цену. Кизлархон запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и горюче-смазочных материалов.
texts.en:
Kizlarkhon is married and the loving mother of four children. She is a very educated and hard working woman, who tries very hard to improve her family's well-being. 

Kizlarkhon has been engaged in growing potatoes, onions and oat for more than six years. Her main focus is growing potatoes, and every year she gets a large harvest that she sells at the market for a good price. 

Kizlarkhon requests a loan for the purchase of mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants.

loans.use: To purchase mineral fertilizers, fuel and lubricants

loans.name: Isabelino

texts.es:
El Sr. Isabelino tiene 43 años de edad, está acompañado de   la señora Ermelinda de 40 años, tienen 2 hijos, una que está  cursando su estudio primario y el otro su estudio secundario.
Don Isabelino se dedica a la reparación de artículos electrónicos, como ser teles, radios y demás. Comenta que se inició en esta profesión como ayudante desde los 15 años, tuvo la ocasión de estudiar y así lo hizo,  actualmente tiene su local propio y con clientes ya formados.
El solicita el crédito para emprender un nuevo negocio con su esposa, el cual sería la venta ambulante, es por ello que desea comprar sabanas frazadas, y demás artículos para la venta. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo, pues le será de gran ayuda a él y a su familia.
texts.en:
Isabelino is 43 years old and in a relationship with Ermelinda, who is 40 years old. They have two children. One is in primary school and the other is in secondary school.

Isabelino works repairing electronics like televisions, radios, and other items. He says that he started in this profession working as an assistant when he was 15 years old. He had the chance to study and he took it. Now he has his own shop and established customers.

He is requesting this loan in order to undertake a new itinerant sales business with his wife. This is why he wants to buy sheets and blankets, as well as other articles to sell. He is grateful to be receiving this opportunity, as it will be a great help to him and his family.

loans.use: to buy sheets, blankets, and other items to sell

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.es:
La Sra. Hilaria tiene 53 años, está casada con Enrique quien es albañil, quien le ayuda con los gastos del hogar, tienen 3 hijos ya todos profesionales e independientes.
Hilaria se dedica principalmente a la venta de comestibles, ensaladas de frutas, bebidas y artículos de primera necesidad. Es muy admirada por sus vecinas por que le consideran muy sacrificada y pos sobre todo muy sacrificada, pues gracias al esfuerzo en conjunto con su marido han podido criar a sus hijos y darles la educación que necesitaron en su tiempo. Gracias al gran esfuerzo sus tres hijos ya cuentan con una profesión, quienes también aportan ya en la casa.
Necesita el préstamo para compra de bebidas, productos lácteos y otros, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y tener variedad para cumplir con el pedido de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sra. Hilaria is 53 years old.  She is married to Enrique, who is a bricklayer and who helps her with the household expenses.  They have 3 children, all of whom are now professionals and live independently.
Hilaria primarily makes her living selling food items- fruit salads, drinks and basic items.  Her neighbors admire her because they consider her to be very self-sacrificing, above all else, self-sacrificing.  Thanks to her effort, in conjunction with her husband, they were able to raise their children and give them the education they needed at the time.  Thanks to this great effort, their three children each have a profession and also contribute to the household.
Hilaria needs the loan to purchase drinks, dairy products and other items, with which she will be able to stock up and have the variety that her customers ask for.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to stock up her store and to satisfy her customers.

loans.name: Nazira

texts.ru: Bai Tushum and Partners expresses gratitude to all Kiva lenders who helped Nazira obtain her first Kiva loan, which was used as intended and repaid. She was able to increase her herd and raise sales of milk and meat products. Now Nazira has applied for a loan of 130,000 KGS for purchasing additional cattle.  It will allow her to raise sales of milk and dairy produce.
texts.en: Bai Tushum and Partners expresses gratitude to all Kiva lenders who helped Nazira obtain her first Kiva loan, which was used as intended and repaid. She was able to increase her herd and raise sales of milk and meat products. Now Nazira has applied for a loan of 130,000 KGS to purchase additional cattle. It will allow her to raise sales of milk and dairy products.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Jenifer

texts.en:
Jenifer lives in Yei.  She sells food at her stall and has been in this business for six years.  She is 39 years old, married and has five children; all of them are still in school. 

Jenifer heard about BRAC South Sudan from her credit officer.  This is her first loan from BRAC.  She has requested a loan of SDG 700 in order to purchase tomatoes and onions.  She will use her extra income from this loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes and onions to sell.

loans.name: Zarobudin

texts.ru: Заробудин женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Он очень воспитанный и трудолюбивый и всегда старается делать всем добро. Более 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. В основном он выращивает пшеницу, картошку и рис. В бизнесе помогают его брат и дети. Заробудин хотел бы получить займ в размере 1000$ США для покупки семян и минеральных удобрений. Он очень надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Zarobudin is married and raising four children. He is very educated and hard working and always tries to do good. He has been engaged in cultivation of agricultural products for more than 10 years. He mainly grows wheat, potatoes and rice. His brother and children help him with the business. 

Zarobudin would like to receive a loan in the amount of 1000 USD for the purchase of seeds and mineral fertilizers. He really hopes for your help and mercy.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Nukra

texts.ru: Нукра трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Она замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Чтобы помогать мужу на содержании семьи она начала заниматься купле- продажей детской одежды. Муж помогает по бизнесу. Она имеет богатый опыт, она в этом бизнесе уже 16 лет. Нукра запрашивает займ для покупки летней детской одежды. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Nukra is a hardworking and conscientious woman. She is married and the loving mother of four children. In order to help her husband with to provide for the family she started buying and reselling children's clothing. Her husband helps with the business. She has extensive experience; she has already been in this business for 16 years. 

Hukra requests a loan for the purchase of children's summer clothes. She hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy children's summer clothes for reselling

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is forty-three years old and married with two children.  She does tailoring to earn a living.  She has been in this business for sixteen years and describes her business environment as favourable because there is limited competition.  

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to open three tailoring shops in the future.  She has applied for 20,000 Kenyan Shillings to buy a sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Hazel

texts.en:
Hazel is single and she is twenty-one years old.  She resides at Sta. Maria, Tangub City, The Philippines.  Hazel owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products to earn a living and she's been two years in this business.  Each month, she earns PHP 6,000 doing this type of business. 

She has requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase new items to expand the range of products she offers.  In 2011, Hazel joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation.  In the future, Hazel wants to save a reserve for emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand the range of products she offers in her shop.

loans.name: Graciela Cristel

texts.es:
Graciela tiene 31 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener uno de los más importantes atractivos turísticos del Perú, el cual es el Candelabro de Paracas y las Islas ballestas; asimismo se caracteriza por sus actividades principales que son la pesca y la agricultura. Graciela es muy entusiasta, en sus tiempos libres disfruta de salir a pasear sobre todo cuando está preocupada; como buena peruana le gusta mucho la comida y por ello uno de sus paltos favoritos es el riquísimo “Ají de Gallina”. Graciela solo estudio hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser contadora.

Con mucho esfuerzo logro tener su negocio de venta de panes en el que trabaja actualmente, Graciela se levanta muy temprano para poder ofrecer sus productos y sobre todo porque la mayoría de clientes espera comer sus riquísimos panes temprano en el desayuno; ella trabaja alrededor de 3 horas diarias y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo responsable.

Graciela está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su ayuda ella podrá comprar un mostrador para poder exhibir sus productos de mejor manera; lo que le permitirá tener mayores ingresos para poder  estudiar y seguir luchando para cumplir su gran sueño:” Tener su casa propia y estudiar la carrera de contabilidad”.
texts.en:
Graciela is 31 years old.  She lives in Pisco, a city known for having Peru's most important tourist attractions, the  Candelabro de Paracas and the Ballestas Islands.  Likewise, Pisco is known for its main industries, fishing and agriculture.  Graciela is very enthusiastic.  In her free time, she likes to go for walks, especially if she feels worried.  Like a good Peruvian, she likes food a lot, and one of her favorite dishes is the delicious “Ají de Gallina” (a traditional spicy chicken stew).  Graciela only went to school until fifth grade, but she would have liked to have studied accounting.

With a lot of work, Graciela was able to start a business selling bread, which is her current work.  Graciela gets up very early in order to sell her products, especially because the majority of her customers want to eat her delicious bread early, for breakfast.  She works about 3 hours a day, during which time she can serve up to 40 customers.  She believes that her business is going well because she is very friendly with her customers, and above all, she is responsible.

Graciela is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, since thanks to their help she will be able to purchase a display rack to better display her products, which will allow her to have better earnings so she can study and keep fighting for her grand dream: "to have her own home and to study the profession of accounting."

loans.use: to purchase a display rack.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise (groceries, drinks, soda, vegetables, etc.)

loans.name: Kholbi

texts.ru: Холби проживает в районе Кубодиен. Ей 39 лет. Она замужем. У нее шестеро детей. Холби имеет среднее образование. Она уже год занимается животноводством. Кредит берет для закупа мелко - рогатого скота.
texts.en: Kholbi lives in the region of Qubadiyon. She is 39 years old, married and has six children. Kholbi has secondary education. She is doing animal husbandry. She is taking out this loan to buy small horned cattle.

loans.use: to buy small horned cattle.

loans.name: Pourméra

texts.fr: Madame Pourméra est une femme mariée, parent bénéficiaire, âgée  de 57 ans. Elle habite dans une des localités sénégalaises et s’active depuis plus de 15 ans dans le commerce d’encens, de bijoux plaqués, de tissus et de chaussures. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis juin 2003. Elle a déjà remboursé 7 crédits antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 100 000 frs prévu pour  payer les frais médicaux  pour un  proche parent malade. Ce  financement lui permettra de soutenir un parent  en  l’aidant  à retrouver sa santé.
texts.en: Mrs. Pourméra, 57, is married and a parental beneficiary. She lives in a Senegalese town and has been selling incense, jewelry, fabric and shoes for the past 15 years. She has been a member of the U-IMCEC since June 2003. She has properly reimbursed 7 prior loans. She is requesting a loan of 100,000 cfa francs to pay the medical bills of a sick parent. The money will enable her to help an ailing parent regain their health.

loans.use: payer les frais médicaux pour un parent

loans.name: Hoshimjon

texts.ru: Хошимчон добрый, активный и трудолюбивый молодой парень. Он еще не женат. Более 5 лет он занимается откормом и продажей мелкого рогатого скота. После покупки скота откармливает их в течении 2-3 месяцев , а затем продает их заново за хорошую цену. В бизнесе помогает его брат. Хошимчон запрашивает займ для покупки мелкого рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en:
Hoshimjon is a kind, active and hard-working young man. He is not married yet.  He has been fattening up small livestock for resale for more than 5 years.  He buys livestock, fattens it up for 2 to 3 months, and then resells it at a good price.  His brother helps him with his business.
Hoshimjon is requesting a loan to buy small livestock in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Rosanna

texts.en:
Rosanna is a hardworking entrepreneur who for the past 32 years has run a sari-sari (general) store in the Philippines. She earns additional income from farming rice.

Rosanna has sustained her shop through her own efforts and with the help of loans. She is borrowing 25,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more items like canned goods, snack foods and other groceries for her sari-sari.

Rosanna’s ambition is to save enough money to start another business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries for her sari-sari.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru: Светлана - постоянный клиент Надежды Украины и брать кредиты в другом месте не хочет. Ее полностью устраивают условия микрокредитования. В этот раз Светлане понадобились деньги для закупки женской спортивной одежды маленького размера. Это очень ходовой товар, который поможет Светлане получить хорошую прибыль. Недавно Светлана с мужем сделали ремонт в квартире у дочки.
texts.en:
Svetlana is a regular client of Hope Ukraine and has no interest in borrowing money from others. She is fully satisfied with the terms of microcredit. 

This time, Svetlana needs money to purchase women's sportswear in small sizes. This very popular merchandise will help her make a good profit. Recently, Svetlana and her husband renovated their daughter's apartment.

loans.use: to purchase additional merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.fr: La cliente est  un entrepreneur, âgée de 34 ans, mariée, mère de 6 enfants. Son mari est un mâcon constructeur. Elle est vendeuse friperie. Elle expose ses marchandises au marché central de Virunga. Depuis sa jeunesse, elle exerce ces petites activités génératrices de revenus de ce genre jadis,  quand elle vivait dans son village avant de s’installer dans la ville de Goma. Cependant, elle vient d’obtenir  son  16eme  crédit de Hekima. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir  de s’approvisionner avec  2 ballons de friperie. En plus, elle souhaite  voir ses enfants grandir confortablement, acheter une parcelle et y construire et voir prospère ses activités.  La cliente remercie Hekima pour  ses actions en faveur de pauvres femmes exclues de banque classique.
texts.en: The client is a 34-year-old entrepreneur.  She is married and the mother of 6 children.  Her husband is a builder and mason.  She sells used clothing by displaying her merchandise at the central market in Virunga.
